wikipedia_page.main: Roger Hicks (1950–2019) was a British author of more than 30 photography books, plus a biography of 14th Dalai Lama written with Ngakpa Chogyam, a teacher of Buddhism in UK, travel books, cook-books and others. Many were written with his wife Frances Schultz. A regular contributor to Amateur Photographer Magazine, he frequently wrote for Shutterbug magazine in the United States.

response: *Final Analysis - Weekly essay from Roger Hicks.
* Roger Hicks (author), author of photography and cook books
* Roger Hicks (rock musician), Australian rock musician
